Trade/Device Name(s): UniCel DxC 800 SYNCHRON System Software Version 5.0
Regulation Name(s): Discrete photometric chemistry analyzer for clinical use
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Beckman Coulter UniCel DxC 800 SYNCHRON System Software Version 5.0 as a clinical chemistry analyzer for in vitro diagnostic assays such as glucose determination
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for fully automated in vitro determination of cleared clinical laboratory assays such as glucose, including quantitative determination of glucose in serum, plasma, urine, or cerebrospinal fluid to aid in diagnosing and treating carbohydrate metabolism disorders.
